name: Demon Soaker
description:
An ancient portal opened deep in some ruins.. You're sent in with the one weapon that can surely extinguish this flame of evil.. A squirt gun.

A twin stick shooter made for My First Game Jam Summer 2018, with the theme of "water." I had a lot more planned, a bunch of assets and animations, humanoid character and all, but time ran away from me and life uh, finds a way - to get in the way. I learned a lot, even if I wasn't able to meet the expectations I had set for myself with this game. Let me know if you think I should continue working on it or not. Thanks so much!

Control should switch from KB+M to controller just by pressing a key or button on the device.

Controls are currently...

Move:

WASD / Left stick

Aim:

Mouse / Right stick

Shoot:

Left click / Right trigger

Reload:

R / left face button (X on xbox \ sqaure on playstation)

Some things on the future to do list... Add a big final countdown in the last few seconds, traps / holes to avoid, sound fx (!!!), alter the math to make scoring more interesting, attribute the art I used, and fix the smoke particle/sfx that isn't working right, and more.

Off the top of my head I'd like to thank:

Kenney.nl for the particles, font, and all his other assets I didn't use today.

Kevin MacLeod for his song "Evil Incoming" found at freepd.com.

Countless tutorials I've used and the wonderful documentation for Unity!

and whoever made the 3D dungeon set I found on opengameart, couldn't find you so if you recognize the tiles let me know!
